name: Hilton East Midlands Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this on a Hilton special offer which was outstanding value. This hotel is conveniently placed for many local attractions and East Midlands Airport and Donington.
reviews.title: Well positioned good value very friendly

likes.disliked: — Internet tariff and Lobby toilet hygiene

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were consistently well mannered and very helpful.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay

reviews.text: The rooms were very good with large widescreen TV and good range of channels.
reviews.title: Awful
misleading /disappointed
reviews.text: The prices for internet use were exorbitant in my opinion.
I would definitely revisit if I am in the area again.
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel on sale- fifty pounds per night and I would not have paid a penny more. The hotel is OLD with sticky tape holding the carpet in the bar to the floor, dirty walls, etc. The rooms are worn, although were clean. I would only recommend this hotel if like us, you are booked on a very early flight from East Midlands in the morning. The hotel food looked terrible so we chose to drive to the nearby services and purchase food from the Marks and Spencer food hall there. Note that you need to drive to the airport too- although the name suggests the hotel is close to the airport- you stll need to drive to the airport. There are actually hotels on the site of the airport so if this is your motivation for staying at the hotel, do not book this- there are others that ARE actually on the airport grounds within walking distance to the terminal.
reviews.title: Only good if ourchased on SALE- close to the airport but that is it

likes.disliked: — No where near walking distance to the airport as advertised.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed in The Hilton for an overnight stop and parking for our recent holiday to Zakynthos.We found the Hotel ideal being only a few minutes drive away from the Airport. Check in was very efficient and the Club Room allocated very spacious, modern and clean.We booked a table for dinner and were pleasantly surprised at both the bottle of complimentary wine and the price of the food in the Restaurant as we had earlier bought some drinks in the Bar and found them to be exorbitant. Waiter service received from Paul was entertaining and the food was very good.We had a peaceful nights sleep and the Airport transfer was without a hitch.This was a good start to our holiday. On returning we encountered problems with the transfer back to the Hotel. There were 4 of us waiting for the transfer,to be told by 2 seperate drivers that we had " a lot of cases".Our reply that 2 cases per couple for a foreign holiday wasn't excessive was met with general tutting and shrugging of shoulders. This however wasn't the Hotels fault. We were eventually driven back by a nice guy in a people carrier.
reviews.title: Relaxing start to our Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would definitely stay at this Hotel again if flying from East Midlands.
reviews.title: Pleased with grandure

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel with my wife for a night in july.
reviews.title: Checked into made up bedroom with slept in beds !!!!!!

reviews.text: It was much grander than we thought it would be. Rooms are huge (we stayed in a club room), although if your not a fan of soft pillows you may struggle to sleep. Bathrooms are lovely with everything at a good hight and nice powerful shower.
reviews.title: Good hotel stayed during Moto GP weekend

reviews.text: This Hilton is on the decline. Mildew in shower. Smell of humidity in bathroom. Poor lighting in rooms. Extremely narrow twin beds. I will tell my employer never to put me here again. On a brighter side the staff was flawless.
reviews.title: Not Nice.....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was an overnight stay with parking for an early morning flight. Although we weren't in the hotel for long we were a little disappointed with a few things. The staff on the reception were very efficient and polite and the taxi service to and from the airport was good. But the hotels cleanliness left a little to be desired. The carpets along the corridors were dirty and there was a razor head outside our bedroom door. There were room service trays with breakfast left overs at 8pm at night. The room itself wasn't too bad but the bathroom needed a little extra attention. The bar prices were extortionate. (Over £12 for a glass of wine and a pint of lager). As there are several other hotels much closer to the airport we would probably try one of those next time!
reviews.title: Nice staff, dirty hotel, over-inflated bar prices

reviews.text: I stay in Hiltons all over the UK and have stayed at the East Midlands Hilton a fair few times now.
reviews.title: Tired Hotel
GREAT HOTEL
reviews.text: What Im noticing is the Hotel is slipping on its standards more and more.
I booked a no - smoking room to be given a smoking room.
reviews.title: STAFF WONDERFUL,HOTEL GREAT

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed for one night as had early flight next day.the cost of the room with car parking was very good.The rom and the srvice was very good.The only downside was the price of the food and drink.A pint of lager was nearly £5.00 and a 250ml glass of wine was £8.50.We were lucky as there was a happy hour on when we arrived,drinks were half price(except the250ml glasses) so we bought several drinks.Food was expensive also £15.00 for a curry,£8.0 for a sandwich.we went to the local service station for a sandwich.
reviews.title: nice hotel,but drinks very expensive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would stay here again but i would make alternative drinking and eating arrangements.
reviews.title: Warning!!!!!!!!! Beware your car is not safe!!!!!!

likes.disliked: — the way the manager delt with our problems

reviews.text: Had a very enjoyable time........until we checked out and returned to our car which had been broken into during the night, then to find that several other cars been done aswel. we contacted the manager who came to look at the damage and take an itinerary of what was stolen and gave us the comforting words of "well atleast you still have your tyers, as another car was left just on bricks a few weeks ago". He just didn't seem very interested in what was going on, and proceded to tell us that there are no security camera's facing certain areas of the car park.
reviews.title: Don't even try to park here!

likes.disliked: — Lousy attitude from the front desk - not interested enough to be helpful

reviews.text: So unless you are traveling by taxi and do not have to leave your vehicle in the car park, it could possibly be a nice stay. But i know i will never be returning to this hotel.
reviews.title: Apalled

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 28 Nov 08
reviews.title: Airport Hotel?

aka: Hilton East Midlands Airport Hotel Castle Donington
